title: KOOMPI OS
subtitle: Operating System
desc: A lightweight, decentralized, crypto/security-oriented open-source operating system derived from Archlinux. KOOMPI OS is built on a kernel and provides an environment for multiple applications and software to run simultaneously.

title: SALA KOOMPI
subtitle: E-Learning
desc: Virtual platform for students, teachers, and content creators. Explore STEAM educational content on this one-stop digital classroom.

title: KOOMPI FIFI
subtitle: Network
desc: As part of our Internet-For-All initiative, KOOMPI Fi-Fi is a wireless internet infrastructure designed for schools and neighboring communities providing fast fiber internet at a low cost.

title: KOOMPI ONELAB
subtitle: Lab Solution
desc: KOOMPI Onelab is a computer laboratory with hardware and software solution that enables teachers and administrators to facilitate and monitor students' progress in real time.

title: KOOMPI Robotic Program
subtitle: Robotic
desc: A part of KOOMPI ACADEMY, Robotic Program is an extension program focused on robotic engineering and electronics.
